text: - Anaplastic Sarcoma of the Kidney         - Nephroblastomatosis is not cancer but may become Wilms tumor.    - Having certain genetic syndromes or other conditions can increase the risk of Wilms tumor.    - Tests are used to screen for Wilms tumor.    - Having certain conditions may increase the risk of renal cell cancer.    - Treatment for Wilms tumor and other childhood kidney tumors may include genetic counseling.    - Signs of Wilms tumor and other childhood kidney tumors include a lump
